definition: item made from woven silk or rayon
silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Ropes at that time was made from silk fibers, animal fur etc. Idea of making a rope came from vines.
sentences.chinese: 當時繩子是用絲織品和動物皮毛做的。

sentences.english: Technology introductions The brocade is the colored silk production with decorative patterns or calligraphies and paintings.
sentences.chinese: 神奇的東方之花織錦是指有花紋或字畫的彩色絲織品。

sentences.english: Silk and silk fabrics emerged at least 5500 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 絲綢和絲織品至少在5500年前就出現了。

sentences.english: Huzhou Crape is a kind of rugged silk produced in Zhejiang with a light texture.
sentences.chinese: 湖縐是浙江出產的一種有皺紋的絲織品，質地輕盈。

sentences.english: Our compa recenty mainly deals with the export business of silk goods.
sentences.chinese: 我公司主要謀劃絲織品的入口業務。

sentences.english: On silk and porcelains, phoenix patterns distinguish themselves from others with their unique styles.
sentences.chinese: 在絲織品和瓷器上，鳳紋更以其獨特的風采脫穎而出。

sentences.english: This paper makes an introduction to these multicoloured silk articles.
sentences.chinese: 文章對這些絢麗多彩的楚漢絲織品作了介紹。

sentences.english: cloth, and the Hans sometimes used silk fabric as material for paintings.
sentences.chinese: 人們有時以絲織品作爲原料作畫。

sentences.english: Ropes at that time was made from silk fibers, animal fur etc.
sentences.chinese: 當時繩子是用絲織品和動物皮毛做的。

definition: case for an ink stone or ink slab
